issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

assignee.name: andersmo
assignee.emailAddress: andersmo at stud dot ntnu dot no

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Example output is in the test lang/dcl.sql, extracted here.

ERROR X0X07: Cannot drop jar file '"EMC"."MAIL_APP"' because its on your db2j.database.classpath '"EMC"."MAIL_APP"'.

Also the its should be it's (it is).
Might also make sense to change drop to remove, as the procedure is called remove_jar.
fields.summary: Error message  X0X07  has incorrect property name, db2j.database.classpath instead of derby.database.classpath
Fix Error message X0X07 in doc to match string changes in code

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

author.name: andersmo
author.emailAddress: andersmo at stud dot ntnu dot no

comments.body: Patch enclosed. Courtesy of vim: ":/^X0X07.S=/ s/db2j.database/derby.database/" on all the localized property files under java/engine/org/apache/derby/loc/, and also the other suggested fixes for the english property file. (My first derby patch! Yay! =)

updateAuthor.name: andersmo
updateAuthor.emailAddress: andersmo at stud dot ntnu dot no

author.name: andersmo

comments.body: Oops, forgot to update unit tests accordingly. Fixed (and tested) patch coming RSN. =)
